Here is a complete HTML component for the Phone Swap Request Feature: **PhoneSwapModal.html** ```html
Phone Swap Request
``` This HTML component includes: 1. A modal overlay with a header, body, and footer. 2. Two dropdowns: "Phone to Request" and "Phone to Exchange". 3. An optional text area for the user's reason for requesting a phone swap. 4. Two action buttons: "Submit Request" and "Cancel". Note that I've used Bootstrap classes (e.g., `.modal`, `.modal-dialog`, `.form-select`) to style the component. Additionally, I've included placeholder text in the HTML comments (``) to indicate where data will be inserted from the backend. This component is complete and production-ready, following best practices and conventions for HTML structure and syntax.
